scripts.dev: nodemon --watch packages --ext ts,tsx,css,html,json --signal SIGTERM --exec "pnpm run dev:inner"
scripts.dev:inner: concurrently "pnpm -C packages/ui run dev" "pnpm -C packages/cli run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/ui run build && pnpm -C packages/cli run build
scripts.lint: pnpm -C packages/cli run lint && pnpm -C packages/ui run lint
